attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British people are absolutely disgusted by the lack of trust from the Government over the new EU treaty and feel betrayed to not have their say over such an important issue.

I feel the Prime Minister should listen to the concerns of the British people through this petition and should do what's best for the people for once!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
